title: Cathedrals of Culture HDTV 720p Legendado PT-BR
description:
Audio: English
Legendas/subbitles: PortuguÃªs (hardsubed)

=========================================
Episode 1: THE BERLIN PHILHARMONIC
Director/screenwriter: Wim Wenders

Episode 2: THE NATIONAL LIBRARY OF RUSSIA
Director/screenwriter: Michael Glawogger

Episode 3: HALDEN PRISON
Director/screenwriter: Michael Madsen

Episode 4: THE SALK INSTITUTE
Director: Robert Redford

Episode 5: THE OSLO OPERA HOUSE
Director:  Margreth Olin

Episode 6: CENTRE GEORGES POMPIDOU
Director/screenwriter: Karim Ainouz

=========================================

Six directors tackle the question "If buildings could talk, what would they say about us?" by capturing iconic buildings with narration from the perspective of the buildings. 
For all its indulgences, this is a valuable film and a palate-cleansing experience, and an idealistic, high-minded meditation on architecture, the public space and the life of the mind. Originally commissioned as a TV series of six episodes, presented like this it is perhaps not quite a film, but more of a quasi-installation /cine-event.
